text: The Theme Building is a Space Age structure at Los Angeles International Airport in California. It was influenced by "Populuxe" architecture. It is built in a Mid-century modern style now called "Googie". It was built between 1957 and 1961. It was listed as a Historical-Cultural Monument by the city of Los Angeles in 1993. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 20th century Category:Buildings and structures in Los Angeles
title: Theme Building
